vacancies.title: Junior Developer
vacancies.description: Maintain and develop technical quality of the team by using the best engineering techniques and approaches. Follow well-built design and high-quality implementation practices

blocks.title: Key tasks:
content: Maintain and develop technical quality of the team by using the best engineering techniques and approaches
Follow well-built design and high-quality implementation practices
Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product software to ensure strong optimization and functionality

vacancies.title: Web Analyst
vacancies.description: Good knowledge of AdWords, Doubleclick, Crazy Egg, Data Studio, Google Tag Manager, Google Optimize, SEMrush, Google Search Console. 2+ years of experience of implementing Enhanced Ecommerce in Google Analytics via GTM

vacancies.title: Project Manager
vacancies.description: 1.5+ years of experience as Project Manager on a technical product. Strong interest for digital products and technologies. Self-driven, responsible, outspoken, passionate
